title: Exquisite Diamond & Emerald Haaram with South Sea Pearls - Shobha Rani Collection
materials: AAA Grade). Features Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: This magnificent three-layered Haaram showcases intricate floral and paisley motifs meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Kundan technique. The central pendant features a captivating emerald, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The pearls dangle from each layer, adding a touch of elegance and tradition. The design is inspired by the traditional Kasulaperu, but elevated with modern diamond brilliance.
occasions: and other grand occasions. Perfect for brides who want to make a statement with traditional elegance.
description: This Haaram is a true heirloom piece, embodying the grandeur of South Indian jewelry traditions. The superior craftsmanship and exquisite gemstones ensure lasting beauty and value. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls signifies prosperity, fertility, and wisdom, making it a meaningful and cherished piece for generations to come. The Hyderabadi Kundan setting adds a unique touch of royalty.
